name: yundera-github-compiler
description: Clone, build, and run Docker-based projects directly from GitHub URLs.

scripts.dockflow:latest: npm run build && node scripts/version-manager.js increment && npm run docker:build && npm run docker:push && npm run docker:cleanup
scripts.dockflow:dev: npm run build && npm run docker:build-dev && npm run docker:push-dev && npm run docker:cleanup
scripts.dockflow:both: npm run build && node scripts/version-manager.js increment && npm run docker:build && npm run docker:build-dev && npm run docker:push && npm run docker:push-dev && npm run docker:cleanup
